title: Billing Dispute - Unreturned Equipment Charge
description: A former customer is being charged for unreturned equipment they claim to have sent back.

tasks.description: Identify the former customer's account and the specific equipment charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent locates the closed account and the charge for a modem.

tasks.description: Ask the customer for the return tracking number and check it in the logistics system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes the tracking number and uses a tool to verify it.

tasks.description: The tracking number confirms the item was received. Remove the equipment charge from the final bill.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the return was successful and credits the customer's account for the charge.
